attributes.action: stop breaching human rights by keeping there spouses and kids apart
attributes.additional_details:
£18,600 annual salary is unfair to sponsor non EU spouse
minimum wage is £6.31 per hour and if i work full time 38 hours per week on minimum wage i sure not able to get to this figure as it only comes up at £12,468.56 so system is messed up if this law remains there where it is just now than government need to put the minimum wage rate up so we can meet the target of £18,600 by working full time on minimum wage .
